item.title: Scania PGR Series 2004-2018 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 13, 2025

Scania PGR Series 2004-2018 1.55 ETS2

The Scania PGR series, from 2004 to 2018, was a line of heavy-duty trucks produced by Scania that became extremely popular globally and is widely recognized and recreated in simulation games such as Euro Truck Simulator 2. This line was the successor to the Scania 4 Series and marked an important era for the brand.

The series consisted of three main models, differentiated primarily by cab size and height:
P-series: The lowest and most compact cab in the line, ideal for urban operations, distribution, and short-haul operations. It offered easy cab access and excellent visibility, making it a practical choice for jobs requiring frequent stops.
G-series: A compromise, offering a good balance between comfort and space, and being taller than the P-series. It was a versatile cab, suitable for a wide range of applications, from heavy-duty to long-haul transport, with flexible engine options and configurations. The G-series was added to the lineup in 2007.
R-series: The most luxurious and spacious cab in the series. It was designed for long-distance transport, offering maximum driver comfort with increased interior space, bed options, and storage. The R-series became a Scania icon, known for its combination of power and comfort.
Throughout its production period (2004-2018), the PGR series received significant updates and facelifts in 2009 and 2013, keeping the trucks modern and competitive. Production of the PGR series ended in Europe in 2018, ushering in the new generation of Scania trucks.

Credits: fabinho

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mapa ORB v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 13, 2025

Mapa ORB v1.0 ETS2

The “ORB Map” is a map mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), but with a very different approach than most Brazilian maps. The acronym ORB stands for Brazilian Intercity Bus.
The main feature of the ORB Map is that it focuses exclusively on passenger transportation, that is, bus routes. Unlike other Brazilian maps where you drive trucks, ORB was created to simulate the experience of an intercity bus driver, with roads and cities designed for this type of vehicle.

ORB Map Features:
Bus Routes: Gameplay centers on picking up passengers at one bus station and taking them to another, in Brazilian cities recreated in the game.
Detailed Bus Stations: The cities on the map feature realistic bus stations, which serve as departure and arrival points.
*Brazilian traffic and scenery: This mod aims to bring the Brazilian atmosphere to the game, featuring typical Brazilian highway traffic and scenery reminiscent of the country’s countryside.
Compatibility with bus mods: To get the most out of this mod, you’ll need to use bus mods, such as the Bob Constellation you mentioned, as the base game doesn’t have this type of vehicle.
The ORB Map is a project that has been winning over the bus simulation community in ETS2, offering a unique and detailed experience for those who prefer driving buses to trucks.

Credits: equipe orb

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

item.title: PACK DE RODAS RLG3D SPOOTGAME BETA v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 13, 2025

PACK DE RODAS RLG3D SPOOTGAME BETA v1.0 ETS2

The “RLG3D SPOOTGAME BETA” wheel pack is a mod that adds a wide variety of wheels and other truck accessories to Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) and American Truck Simulator (ATS).

With this mod, you can customize your trucks with different styles, including:
Iron wheels, Alcoas, and Speedlines
Various tires
Hubcaps with different ends
Lug nut and hub caps

Credits: rlg3d spootgame
